author: Climate Town
description:
WE'RE WALKING HERE! Get Nebula right here (40% off an annual subscription): https://go.nebula.tv/climatetown
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ClimateTown 
sUbScRiBe FoR mOrE ViDeOs: https://www.youtube.com/c/climatetown?sub_confirmation=1 

Or maybe you want to support us and also get access to behind the scenes videos, discounted live show tickets, and a secret phone line you can call and talk to Rollie? Well then you’ll be shocked to find that’s exactly what our Patreon offers: https://www.patreon.com/ClimateTown

But maybe you got Nebula and you’re wondering, ‘what should I watch??’ Well friend, you could check out Great Cities, a Nebula original from City Beautiful, focused on pivotal design moments for some of the world’s greatest cities: https://nebula.tv/greatcities?ref=climatetown 

Our good friends at Climate Changemakers have made a playbook to help you contact Kathy Hochul to tell her what you think about congestion pricing. But only do that if you LIVE IN NEW YORK STATE.
title: New York Declares War On Traffic (A Congestion Pricing Story)
